title: Project For Creation Projects
body:
goods ..... I have  project   {{champion:114}}  to create with projects , as do i now?

Will re-create the boxes that give projects? 

Because only i need 2 projects to creat my lovely Project {{champion:114}} .

I'll Wait For Answers ..... THX <3

replies.body:
If I'm understanding you correctly, you're asking if we'll be releasing more PROJECT augmented caches so you can finish crafting content with the PROJECT cores. 

I don't have any information on whether this event is coming back, but keep an eye on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/), where an announcement would be made if it did come back.
